description: This file defines a Flutter widget called NoteCard, which displays a note's title and a preview of its content within a card interface.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A stateless widget that presents a note's title and content preview within a card, with optional tap interaction.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: Constructor for initializing NoteCard with required note data and optional tap callback.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the NoteCard, including styling and layout.
